name: Monster Maker DX
description:
Arrow keys to move in the menus or dungeon;

Z to select and X to cancel. Shift toggles walk/run.

Slay monsters in the dungeon, then fuse them with your monster once you escape to gain new moves and stats.

I made this mostly to prove to myself I can finish something, even if it's terrible. So here we are, I guess.

Made for A Game By It's Cover 2019. Inspired by http://famicase.com/19/softs/067.html. Thanks to Tomas Putanas for the concept.
